ygData.subject: RE: Bellow??
ygData.msgSnippet: Not necessarily, if you had targetted a party member, or a mob that the NPC liked, the NPC will attack. Just for giggles, go up and bellow at a player near a
ygData.messageBody:
Not necessarily, if you had targetted a party member, or a mob that the NPC
liked, the NPC will attack.

Just for giggles, go up and bellow at a player near a guard in Kelethin.
You will wake up at your bind spot...

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Schuldes [SMTP:jgs@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 3:49 PM
> To: '_eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqbards] Bellow??
>
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> A couple days ago I was standing next to a couple NPC's and laid out a
> bellow. Seconds later, I was laid out.
>
> So, is bellow AE in some way? Or did I have the NPC targeted by accident?
> I would swear that I had the monster targeted.
>
> Sylly
> Bard of the 15th level
> a.k.a. Robo-Bard
> camped out somewhere on Innoruuk
>
>
